body:
Why are we still here... Just to suffer? Sometimes I can feel my leg, and my arm even my fingers.. the body I've lost..
The comrades I've lost.. it's like they're all still here...... You feel it too, don't you?
Man same happened to me man person under my comment
DID I SERIOUSLY JUST SPOIL THE ANIME FOR MYSELF FROM A FUCKING HENTAI.  MY HORNY ASS SHOULD’VE FINISHED IT FIRST.  AHHHHH IM A DUMBFUCK SKSHAKHSKASHS
